articles.description: NEW DELHI: Oppo has slashed prices of variants of Oppo A12, Oppo A15, Oppo F17 and Oppo Reno 3 Pro. The handsets have got a price cut of up to Rs 2,000. As per a tweet shared by Mahesh Telecom, Oppo A12 with 3GB RAM and 32GB storage will retail at Rs 8,990 no…

articles.title: OnePlus 8T, Asus ROG Phone 3 and 9 other top smartphones with a buttery smooth 120Hz display - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Here is a list of smartphones in India that come with a 120Hz display.
articles.content: Asus ROG Phone 3 | Asus ROG Phone 3 is among the few gaming smartphones to come with up to 144Hz refresh rate display. The smartphone features top of the line specs like a 6.59-inch FHD+ AMOLED displ… [+104 chars]

articles.author: Alan Friedman
articles.title: Thanks to Nvidia's cloud streaming platform, Fortnite is returning to iOS - PhoneArena
articles.description: While popular game Fortnite is no longer available from the App Store and iOS, it will soon be available via Nvidia's GeForce NOW cloud gaming platform using the Safari mobile browser.
